ygData.subject: Athren's Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Head: Blackened Iron Crown (Lambent helm for skill work) Face: Guise of the Deceiver Neck: +9cha (plat cat s eye I think it was) Ears: Opalline earrings
ygData.messageBody:
Head: Blackened Iron Crown (Lambent helm for skill work)
Face: Guise of the Deceiver
Neck: +9cha (plat cat's eye I think it was)
Ears: Opalline earrings
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
Back: Cloak of the Ice Bear
Arms: Lambent
Bracer: Lambent
Bracer: Serpentine
Fingers: Gold star ruby rings
Chest: Lambent
Legs: Lambent
Feet: Lambent

Silvery war axe
EB Mace
Dirk for ranged

Plans for future:
Carnal Pauldrons
the +9dex choker to trade with the 9cha for circumstances
Plat star ruby veil for circumstances
Froglok crown/Crown of king tranix
Cloak of Shadows
Rapier and dagger for wielding (Obsidian shard in bank, working on maxing
1hb)

FYI, from Lovern's post, GG stands for Good Game. It's an acronym
prominent in our guild due to it's roots in Quake, and is often said after
matches as a form of ritual.

Athren Notechaser, no longer the only bard of <The Revolution>
